description:
My GPS is the solution for all of your mobile GPS needs.  With the ability to track heading, speed, lat/long, altitude, top speed, get your 
current address, get directions and a number of other things My GPS has what you need covered. 
**There is a help page along with a support email address to assist you should you have any issues with the My GPS application**

Through the menu you can access Preferences, Help, and two newer features, Find my Car and Waypoints.  -Find my Car allows you to save your current location and then map 
it later on, thus giving you the ability to easily find your car.  -Waypoints allows you to save any number of locations along with a description and the 
date, you can also export these locations via email.

-Preferences allows you to customize the display of My GPS.  You can set it to English or Metric, keep track of top speed and many more things.

-The help page is updated often so if you have any issues you should be able to find a solution there.  And if not there's a support email address for you 
to contact.
